name: lambda_handler
description: Lambda function to scan code repository for vulnerabilities and push remediated code to a new branch

parameters.name: branch_name
parameters.description: Branch name of code repository that needs to be scanned

parameters.name: file_extensions_to_exclude
parameters.description: File extensions like needs to be excluded from scanning

parameters.name: folders_to_exclude
parameters.description: Folder names to exclude from scanning

parameters.name: new_remediated_branch_name
parameters.description: New branch name to push remediated code
